data.offerdescription: This plan comes with the data plan that'll go with your lifestyle and usage. The 19GB mobile data allows you to keep up with a hectic schedule. This is the recommended line-only plan for you!
Everything from your social life to your work:Stay updated on your favorite shows and stream new episodes at home or on your commute! Get an additional 21GB data on top of all offers.
Now you can enjoy more calls, texts, and entertainment add-ons that will help you do more with this line-only plan.
